title: TonyTeach.com Announces New Training Course on 2D Character Rigging in Toon Boom Harmony: Anatomy of a 30:-sec Short: “Camper, the Intergalactic Bounty Hunter”
text:
Interactive, easy-to-follow, step-by-step videos for beginning and intermediate animators.
Have you ever wanted to learn the basics of animating and character rigging in Toon Boom Harmony? Well, here’s your chance to learn—at your own pace. Designed for beginners and intermediate users, this interactive, step-by-step video course features character rigging and background setup that can be done in Toon Boom Harmony 12, Essentials, Advanced or Premium.
Traditional animators, studio animators, animation students, game developers, and hobbyists can learn how to rig their characters and use bone and curve deforming tools in Toon Boom Harmony from Tony Ross, founder and principal of the tutorial site tonyteach.com. These easy-to-follow lessons cover everything from the interface and tools to creating a short scene with backgrounds and foregrounds set up in three-dimensional space.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wMBbj3j48Gs
Watch behind-the-scenes as Tony works with his team of character designers, voice talent, and animators and you’ll learn to draw in Toon Boom Harmony as well as create hinged rigging, breaking your character into layers, the bone deformer, the curve deformer, lip-syncing, animating the camera, and more! Accessible and cost-effective, it’s a one-stop shop for professors and students, animation studios and advertisers to learn from a trainer who specializes in teaching otherwise complex software!
Tony Ross has more than two decades of professional freelance and teaching experience as a former professor of electronic arts at the Atlanta College of Art. Specializing in animation, interactivity, multimedia, motion graphics, and web applications and design, his expertise in the arts also extends to the fields of graphic design and illustration. As the creator and owner of tonyteach.com, his tutorials have been featured on Creative Cow, Toon Boom, Gomediazine, Adobe.com, Infinite Skills, O’Reilly, Lynda.com, and his impressive roster of clients has included Dabel Brothers, Marvel Comics, The Freedom Toast, and Dean Koontz.
To purchase the tutorial, Anatomy of a: 30-sec. Short: “Camper, the Intergalactic Bounty Hunter,” click here: via Sellfy [PayPal] or Gumroad [credit card] or, to obtain more information about Toon Boom and other software tutorials, visit http://youtube.com/tonyteach .
